body:
Wow, it's been 5 months since I last made a post here. Anyhow, I wanted to see how Avicus is doing and shtuff. How's the server? Has advertising kicked off from last I was here?

Tell me, I wish to know!

Also, my art skills have been coming along greatly to anyone who remembers me! 




Here are some of my latest creations, what do ya think of 'em?

title: Hi! It's-a me, Zintenka!

replies.body:
Hi. Let's just say that things have kept going downhill with Avicus.

Art looks cool though.

replies.body:
@Clijmart I've moved on from Map making, but it would be nice to visit the Build Server. Know the IP Clij? :)

@Riilo Hey man! Life's been steadily coming along. I'm progressing through college at a decent rate (Some failures, but they can be retaken), my art is improving and I'm part of a Network and I make art for them!

Need to see about getting Paypal so they can finally pay me though.

@Snow Hey Snow! I'm happy for this because last I was here... *Clicks tongue* ...things were a bit IFFY! But I'm glad that things have stabilized.

Anyway, how are things with you, man? Where's Para and the rest of 'em?

@Dis We can work on it together perhaps. I forgot Alex's Build Server IP so you're gonna have to tell me it.

How are things with ya, Dis?

@Sweedie Thank you, and nice name. Sounds like the verbal version of "Sweety". I like it, very smart.

@AtditC Da, I've noticed that so I'm assuming that advertisement never kicked off or is still in progress?

@RATTLE Here, lemme make a list...

I like your name.

That's cool.

That's cooler.

That's true, I'm rusty as hell.

Thank you!
replies.body_tagged:
@Clijmart I've moved on from Map making, but it would be nice to visit the Build Server. Know the IP Clij? :)

@Riilo Hey man! Life's been steadily coming along. I'm progressing through college at a decent rate (Some failures, but they can be retaken), my art is improving and I'm part of a Network and I make art for them!

Need to see about getting Paypal so they can finally pay me though.

@Snow Hey Snow! I'm happy for this because last I was here... *Clicks tongue* ...things were a bit IFFY! But I'm glad that things have stabilized.

Anyway, how are things with you, man? Where's Para and the rest of 'em?

@Dis We can work on it together perhaps. I forgot Alex's Build Server IP so you're gonna have to tell me it.

How are things with ya, Dis?

@Sweedie Thank you, and nice name. Sounds like the verbal version of "Sweety". I like it, very smart.

@AtditC Da, I've noticed that so I'm assuming that advertisement never kicked off or is still in progress?

@RATTLE Here, lemme make a list...

I like your name.

That's cool.

That's cooler.

That's true, I'm rusty as hell.

Thank you!

replies.body:
" I'm assuming that advertisement never kicked off or is still in progress?"
We are at the point where we are not losing the playerbase but stalemated and growing a bit. The planning is almost done there just needs to be some interior structure fixtures before advertising is regularly done.
replies.body_tagged:
" I'm assuming that advertisement never kicked off or is still in progress?"
We are at the point where we are not losing the playerbase but stalemated and growing a bit. The planning is almost done there just needs to be some interior structure fixtures before advertising is regularly done.

replies.body:
Things are good thanks!
I rejoined and retired from the staff team while you were away lol.

Para is working on The Stratus Network. It's kind of like The Overcast Network with similar staff members. It looks cool.

Lots of other people have left and are doing their own thing. 

I'm not really here that often these days, but meh, I'm always floating around :P

replies.body:
@UnregisteredLeaf So the population is actually growing a bit? I've heard different.

But I'm glad to hear a response from someone specialized in this area. Very reassuring!

@SnowSX3 Good to know! I'll make sure to drop by Stratus when I get the chance. See ya around ;)

But I'm glad to hear a response from someone specialized in this area. Very reassuring!
